name: Auto dark pub.dev
description:
A dark theme for pub.dev with support system theme.
Use customize for switch between system theme and primary dark theme.
If browser does not support system theme - usage  primary dark theme.

Github: https://github.com/SergeShkurko/pub.dev-dark
additional_info:
v1.1
* Fixed search button on package page
* Fixed diff colors
* Added support for dart documentation page
* Some improvements
